headline: International Women’s Day 2020: Building a Modern Security Team
keywords: IWD, Diversity, Womenflare, Life @ Cloudflare, Employee Resource Groups
description: When we started at Cloudflare in the summer of 2018, we joined a small security team intent on helping it grow quickly. Cloudflare was already a successful “unicorn” startup and its profile was changing fast, providing cyber security protection for millions of Internet-facing properties.
